item.title: We're Giving Away A Switch 2 Console & Pokemon Legends: Z-A
item.content:encoded:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Pokemon Legends Z-A launched on Switch and Switch 2 last week, and if you're looking to grab the new game, you're in luck. GameSpot is giving away the Nintendo Switch 2 + Pokemon Legends: Z-A console bundle to one lucky reader. The bundle includes the new Nintendo Switch 2 console and a download code for the digital Switch 2 Edition of Pokemon Legends: Z-A. The winner will be randomly selected via a raffle drawing and will be announced on October 28. Read on to see how you can enter for a chance to win--including ways to get additional entries in the drawing.

To enter GameSpot's Switch 2 + Pokemon Legends: Z-A bundle giveaway, all you have to do is subscribe to GameSpot's new Deals Newsletter. Signing up is free--just enter your email below and you'll be entered into the raffle. The deadline to enter is 11:59 pm PT on Monday, October 27. Along with the chance to win the bundle, joining the Deals Newsletter email means you'll get the latest and greatest discounts on video games, Blu-rays, Lego sets, and beyond, as well as notifications on the biggest new preorders, all directly to your inbox each week.

Signing up for the GameSpot Deals Newsletter gets you a single entry in the giveaway, but there are ways to earn additional entries as well. Click the link below, then follow the official GameSpot and GameSpot Deals accounts on X (previously known as Twitter), visit GameSpot's YouTube Channel, and follow the official GameSpot TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook accounts to get additional entries. Each activity gets you one extra raffle entry--so if you complete them all, that means you'll have seven entries in Nintendo Switch 2 + Pokemon Legends: Z-A giveaway. Further details on the contest are available below.

  • Lego's New Spider-Man And Iron Man Busts Get Limited-Timed Discounts
  • Joe Hill's Massive New Horror-Fantasy Novel Arrives Just In Time For Halloween
  • Icon Blue Limited Edition DualSense PS5 Controller Is Available Now
  • + Show More More Gaming, Tech, and Entertainment Deals & Preorders Links (5)
  • Lego Technic McLaren F1 Race Car Retires Soon, Save $72 At Amazon Before It's Gone
  • Pokemon TCG Amazon-Exclusive Holiday Premium Collection Is Back In Stock
  • Get 10 Shudder Original Horror Movies On Blu-Ray For Only $51
  • ROG Xbox Ally X In Stock At Best Buy On Launch Day, Ships Immediately
  • Pokemon Nintendo Switch 2 Console Bundle Restocked At Amazon On Launch Day

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com

Latest in Pokemon Legends: Z-A
